Skills Index

The skills ontology is really the heart of the knowledgebase. It is broken into separate perspectives:

  1. Knowledge
    1. [concepts-and-principles-index]
    2. [methods-index]
    3. [processes-index]
    4. [standards-index]
  2. Hard Skills
    1. Technical Skills
      1. Architecture and Design
      2. Analysis and Experience Design
      3. Development
      4. Testing
      5. Deployment and Infrastructure
      6. Planning and Tracking
    2. Business Skills
      1. Marketing
      2. Sales
      3. Finance
  3. Tools and Technologies
    1. Instruments
    2. Hardware
    3. Software
    4. Cloud APIs
  4. Soft Skills
  5. Domain Experience
